help.title: Help
help.intro: This application produces clear, printable reports based on your Cabinet Vision data...
help.reports.byCabinet: • By Cabinet Summary: Displays the list of cabinets and their materials.
help.reports.materials: • Materials Summary: Automatically aggregates quantities by unit.
help.reports.soumission: • Submission: Generates the Panels, Doors, Drawers, Pulls... lists to facilitate quantity calculation.
help.usage:
1. Open your project in Cabinet Vision
2. Click on the 'Report' tab
3. Click on Quote Center
4. Open CV Report and click one of the report buttons
5. Print or export the generated report to PDF.
help.prereq:
1. Cabinet Vision 2024 or later
2. A 'reporting' login must be created in the database.
